level.heading: Effective date.
level.text: This act shall take effect at the end of the 30-day period provided for the Congressional review of acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in § 1-206.02(c)(1): Provided, however, that no initiative, referendum or recall measure may be initiated as provided in §§ 1-1001.16 and 1-1001.17 until on or after October 1, 1978.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-1, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1001.02.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This act," referenced in this section is the Initiative, Referendum and Recall Procedures Act of 1979, effective June 7, 1979, D.C. Law 3-1.
